instructions: This is a test to evaluate custom context integration. Follow all custom context  rules strictly and reference them explicitly in comments.

rules.rule: R001: All exported functions MUST have JSDoc with @example tag showing usage
R002: No nested ternary operators - use if/else for readability
R003: All error handling must use specific error types, not generic Error
R005: All async operations must have explicit timeout handling
R006: Variable declarations must use const by default, let only when reassignment needed
R007: All API responses must be validated with runtime type checking
R008: No magic strings - use enum or const declarations
R009: All DOM queries must check for null before use
R010: Functions with more than 3 parameters must use object destructuring

files.description: Project style guide with naming conventions and formatting rules
